dict.string: This app needs access to your camera to help register your profile and set up your profile image. For example, you can use your camera to take a photo of yourself or upload a photo for your profile while booking a service or setting up your account.

This app needs access to your camera to help register your profile and set up your profile image. For example, you can use your camera to take a photo of yourself or upload a photo for your profile while booking a service or setting up your account.

This app needs access to your location to help book services at your current address. The location data will be used to accurately determine your address for technicians to visit and provide on-site services.

This app needs access to your location to help book services at your current address. The location data will be used to accurately determine your address for technicians to visit and provide on-site services.
We need access to your contacts to help you connect with friends and invite them to use our app.
We need access to your microphone to record audio calls to the technicians.
